text: Robert Anthony Eagleson Gordon (born 9 February 1952) is a former British Ambassador to Burma (1995The Independent \- 1999) and Vietnam (2003 - 2007). Gordon was educated at The King's School, Canterbury and Magdalen College, Oxford. He joined Her Majesty's Diplomatic Service in 1973. He served in Warsaw, Santiago and Paris before his ambassadors' appointments.‘GORDON, Robert Anthony Eagleson’, Who's Who 2017, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 2017; online edn, Oxford University Press, 2016 ; online edn, November 2016 accessed 18 January 2017 ==Notes== ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People educated at The King's School, Canterbury Category:Alumni of Magdalen College, Oxford Category:Knights Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Myanmar Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Vietnam
